    df_print: paged

```{r}

library(Glimma)
data(lymphomaRNAseq)
rnaseq <- lymphomaRNAseq

groups <- rnaseq$samples$group

# add lane
groups <- as.data.frame(cbind(
genotype=as.character(groups),
lane=c(rep(4,5),3,1)
))

# add libsize
groups <- cbind(groups, libsize=rnaseq$samples$lib.size)

groups
```



```{r}

library(GlimmaV2)
GlimmaV2(plotType="MDs", x=rnaseq, groups=groups)
```
